attributes.action: End social distancing measures and let The People use their common sense.
attributes.additional_details:
The People have had their civil liberties restricted for long enough to no avail. Human rights have been trampled all over and as a result of this, mental health throughout the country is at an all time low, especially that of children who are taking exams. 
The economy has suffered no end and future generations will have to pay for the follies of today. 
These human rights restricting laws have done no good as coronavirus is still rampant.
attributes.background:
End laws that criminalise people for entering houses of friends and family. End laws that restrict commerce and economic growth. 
Allow people to use their common sense to protect themselves and their loved ones. 
End laws that restrict people’s human rights and civil liberties.
